SUMMARY: YdfH belongs to GntR transcription factor family [10734204] for which consensus sequence is reported to be tnGTnnnACna [11756427]. Although only one site was determined in a gel shift assay, it is possible that YfdH binds as a complex of flanking regions of core sequence (-65 to -50) [22972332]. YdfH is not a global repressor, and few genes are repressed by YdfH [22972332].
